
Welcome to PolSARtools' Documentation!
=======================================

**PolSARtools** is a Python package available on `PyPI <https://pypi.org/project/polsartools/>`_ ğŸ that generates **derived SAR parameters**, including:

- ğŸŒ€ **Polarimetric descriptors**
- ğŸŒ¿ **Vegetation indices**
- ğŸ§© **Polarimetric decomposition parameters**

It supports input from various SAR sensors or directly from **polarimetric matrices** such as: ``S2``, ``C4``, ``C3``, ``T4``, ``T3``, ``C2``, ``T2``.
